bwwExcerpt: "When she's not belting out tunes by Elton John, Tom Waits,  and even Fred  Rogers, the actress plays a half-Mennonite woman named  Sherie Rene  Scott who seeks a balance between her upbringing in a  religion rooted in  self-denial and her longing for fame. It's a  beautiful day in the  neighborhood of this pumped-up cabaret act. B+"
